question: During the reign of which of the following kings, the ChineseÂ traveler Xuanzang visited Kanchipuram?
explanation: Jayantavarman was the son and successor of Maravarman Avanisulamani. According to the Tamil historian, T. V. S. Pandarathar, he was the king who ruled in Madurai, when the Chinese traveler Xuanzang visited Kanchipuram.
